select.sql: select UserID,concat('',Login,'') User from ut_users where GuildID='$auth->guild;' and GuildStatusID=0
select.action: update ut_users set GuildStatusID=if(@Yes;='on','1',if(@No;='on','0',GuildStatusID)) , GuildID=if(@Yes;='on',GuildID,if(@No;='on','0',GuildID)) where UserID=@UserID; and GuildID='$auth->guild;' #update gd_guilds set NumMembers=NumMembers+1 where GuildID='$auth->guild;' and @Yes='on'
